contentfulPagePressRelease.title: QF Students Celebrate International Teachers’ Day

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation (QF) schools honoured local teachers for their commitment and dedication to educating young students in a series of celebrations marking International Teachers’ Day on Wednesday, 5 October.

Classrooms and teacher staffrooms took on a party atmosphere as teachers and pupils at Qatar Foundation schools celebrated the annual event. QF extended its thanks to teachers for the increasingly important role they play in fulfilling its mission to help Qatar on its journey.

pageContext.title: QF Students Celebrate International Teachers’ Day
